participant_1.background:
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.
I enjoy having the freedom to wear whatever I want to work, as long as it's not too revealing.
i am a middle aged mother of two high school boys.
My most valued possession is my sports jersey
I keep up with my family by making time for them each week, whether it's a phone call, a visit, or sending a care package.

participant_2.background:
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
my father is a school teacher , he teaches middle school.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I work in a middle school as a teacher.
Oh wow, I am a middle aged mother of two high school boys.
That sounds like a lot of work! I have a dog that keeps me busy.
I love dogs! I wish I could have one, but we have too many allergies in our house.
That's too bad! I love taking my dog for walks and exploring new places.
That sounds really nice! I like to relax by watching movies with my family.
I love watching movies too! I'm a big fan of Jimmy Fallon.
I'm glad we have something in common! I'm sure we could be good friends.
I think so too! It's nice to meet you!
